file_content.text: Warning. Warning. Reactors two, five and eight approaching critical mass. Carrier cooling system has been disabled.
I knew you were ruthless, but you'd destroy this carrier--kill everyone aboard--just to make a point? If I didn't have to shoot you, I'd give you a job.
I'm flattered by the offer, but Jedi serve peace and justice--not greedy mercenaries who kill for money.
Only someone who has forsaken all decency would believe that money triumphs over morality.
And only fools think morals make them superior.
My only loyalty is to the Republic and its people. You've attacked both, Grevin. Bad move.
Even if you could afford me--which you can't--what makes you think I'd salute anyone calling themselves "Vice Commandant"?
It wasn't a serious offer... "Captain."
You're the one who sent those Regulators to kill Lemda, aren't you? I remember you from our holo chats.
Are you Grevin?
I've been looking forward to this.
I've been hoping we'd meet. You've been on my "to kill" list since I got here.
Prepare to die.
What a coincidence. You're on my list, too.
Once you're dead, the Cartel's paying us more than we'd earn in a lifetime from this planet's idiot "government." Makeb can burn for all we care. So can your Republic.
The Cartel is destroying Makeb to mine isotope-5? What makes that substance worth all this?
Explain isotope-5.
No point telling you. Won't do any good.
Your weapons and war droids are gone. The Storm Carrier's coming apart. Don't lose your last chance to get out of this.
Come with us while you can.
The Republic's seen such grand ambitions before. They never seem to last.
You're overconfident.
People have written off the Republic before. Somehow, it always outlives them.
Don't hold your breath.
You've cost me a fortune today, but I can still recover my expenses. Time to settle your debt.
I'd never work for you.
You've got a real unique definition of "peace and justice."
Loyalty only gets you killed, soldier.
Isotope-5 will change everything. Once they're done mining Makeb, the Hutts will own this galaxy.
Warning: total reactor network meltdown in progress. Abandon ship; repeat, abandon ship.
Ilosov thought you might need a lift! Hang on--I'm coming in!
